statements: SELECT * FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, GPA FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year, major, credits_completed FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE advisor_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, student_name, graduation_year FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE GPA > 3.5;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year, advisor_id FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE major = 'Engineering' AND credits_completed >= 120;
SELECT * FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE enrollment_year = 2020;
SELECT student_name, major, enrollment_year, advisor_id FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_id, student_name, GPA FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE credits_completed > 120 ORDER BY GPA DESC;
SELECT student_name, major, graduation_year FROM StudentOutcomes WHERE advisor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY graduation_year;
SELECT AVG(GPA) AS average_gpa, MIN(credits_completed) AS min_credits, MAX(credits_completed) AS max_credits FROM StudentOutcomes;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade >= 80;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credit FROM Courses ORDER BY course_credit ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 3.5;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_age >= 18 ORDER BY student_grade ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_credit = 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE enrollment_year > 2018;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 3.5;
SELECT student_name, major, course_name FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE major='Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, department FROM Courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_year FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses ORDER BY course_credit DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, GPA FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, department, instructor FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id, course_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE GPA > 3.5 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, instructor, department FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE students.student_id = 1;
SELECT AVG(GPA) AS average_gpa, department FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY department;

SELECT student_name, attendance_date, status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.status = 'Present' AND attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_gender = 'Male';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_instructor, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, exam_type, exam_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN courses ON grades.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_gender='Male';
SELECT course_name, course_instructor, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, final_grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id;
SELECT student_name, exam_type, exam_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE exam_grade = 'A';
